mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_moni_event_base ( C_DESC, C_EXP_ID,C_IS_RECOVERY_EVENT,C_RECOVERY_EVENT_IDS, C_ID, C_NAME, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4, C_TYPE ,C_NAME_DISPLAY ) VALUES( #{desc ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expId ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isRecoveryEvent ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{recoveryEventIds ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{nameDisplay ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

INSERT INTO t_moni_event_base ( C_DESC, C_EXP_ID,C_IS_RECOVERY_EVENT,C_RECOVERY_EVENT_IDS, C_ID, C_NAME, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4, C_TYPE ,C_NAME_DISPLAY ) VALUES
( #{item.desc ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.expId ,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{item.isRecoveryEvent ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{item.recoveryEventIds ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tag1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tag2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tag3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tag4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,#{item.nameDisplay ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_moni_event_base SET C_DESC = #{desc ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_EXP_ID = #{expId ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_IS_RECOVERY_EVENT = #{isRecoveryEvent ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_RECOVERY_EVENT_IDS = #{recoveryEventIds ,jdbcType=TINYINT}, C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME = #{name ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG1 = #{tag1 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG2 = #{tag2 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG3 = #{tag3 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TAG4 = #{tag4 ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_TYPE = #{type ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, C_NAME_DISPLAY = #{nameDisplay ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT C_DESC, C_EXP_ID,C_IS_RECOVERY_EVENT,C_RECOVERY_EVENT_IDS, C_ID, C_NAME, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4, C_TYPE ,C_NAME_DISPLAY FROM t_moni_event_base WHERE C_ID = #{id ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT C_DESC, C_EXP_ID,C_IS_RECOVERY_EVENT,C_RECOVERY_EVENT_IDS, C_ID, C_NAME, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4, C_TYPE ,C_NAME_DISPLAY FROM t_moni_event_base
${orderBy}

SELECT C_DESC, C_EXP_ID,C_IS_RECOVERY_EVENT,C_RECOVERY_EVENT_IDS, C_ID, C_NAME, C_TAG1, C_TAG2, C_TAG3, C_TAG4, C_TYPE ,C_NAME_DISPLAY FROM t_moni_event_base
${orderBy}
